text: Semir Noor Alimeer (Born: 1958 Sep 16) (In Kurdish: سەمیر نوور عەلی مير) ( In Arabic: سمير نور علي مير ) was a Kurdish Iraqi islamic political activist and a member of the Iraqi Dawa Party, He was accused of participating in the 1980 assassination attempt on Tariq Aziz at Al-Mustansiriyah University. He was arrested and executed alongside his father, brother in law, and his young two brother aged (13 and 8 years). Category:1958 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People from Baghdad
title: Semir Noor Alimeer
